call_summary.final_outcome: The caller reported an error on a letter of representation regarding the insurance carrier and claim number. The receptionist collected the caller's contact information and details of the issue, then stated she would send the information to the team for review as no one was currently available.

transfer_context.description: No transfer was attempted. The receptionist informed the caller that no one was available to review the matter and offered to take a message for the team instead.
